summary:
Breaux Vineard is one of the largest vineards in Viginia making wine and conducting tastings on the property.
- Organized events including special festivals, corperate events, and private tastings.
- Served customers with wine tasting and sharing about the wine characteristics as well as vineard history. 
- Closed out earnings for the day while handling $200 in cash.
Role focused on developing the militaries communication. Worked on DEVICE, which was software for the assisting of launching military communication products.
